author: Zack S
comment: Was good till always on stopped working.. Not acceptable for a paid watchface

author: Alex Umanzor
comment: I really enjoy using this face. It's well made with beautiful colors and a great design. However, it would be nice if it allowed the date to appear on the face as well.
title: Could be better

author: allezleblue10
comment: It has an option to remove logo's name; now it looks more elegant. I love it.
title: Love it

author: Juril Moore
comment: Very easy to apply and extremely pleasing desing. That's all :-)
title: Love this face!

author: hou zikun
comment: amazing！

author: Terry. B.
comment: Beautiful!

author: Daniel Aizenman
comment: The best part is how customizable the ambient mode is and it always looks clean. Very unique design that gives a feel of a real modern watch. Also great service when contacting the company.
title: Great watch face

author: Will Roberts
comment: This watch face is my favorite by far. It makes if far less obvious its a smartwatch while idle and consumes very little juice compared to other watch faces. You can even turn off the logo under settings or change some colors. One feature request: make the fade of the background colors more gradual/feathered, especially for other colors.
title: Super clean look, battery friendly

comment: Like this watch face but would and will rate five stars if you could possibly put a nice accent day of the month on it.
title: Like it but.....

author: Corrie Nicholls
comment: Very nice. One if my favourites.
title: Like it

author: Ronald Mercer
comment: Love it and the ambient face is just as cool!
title: Simple and cool

author: Jay Moo
comment: More in this series PLEASE <3
title: Extremely sexy

author: isaacosbiz
comment: Cool man

author: Jordan Rodgers
comment: 5 star easily!!! Only problem that make into 4 star is because why do each time I add a face it adds a extra icon?? It kinda dumb and clutter up my phone I was gonna purchase. Ire face but I saw that it keeps adding icon... why not go through ANDROID Wear app like everyone else??? ... GOOD new though I like the title on face it give the appearance of Molova watch .. MINIMAL but elegant.!!
title: 4 star but for a simple reason

author: Jeff Davis
comment: As another review states... Why put the watch face name on the actual screen?  It ruins the otherwise super clean and elegant look. Besides,  the only person who can read that text is the person wearing the watch and I'm pretty sure they don't need (or care) to see it.  If nothing else,  provide an option to disable/enable it please.
title: Nearly great

author: Lisa Goldbaum
comment: Not sure why you guys feel the need to put the name of the watchface on all your watchfaces. Looks cluttered, obtrusive and takes away from the elegance. Why would anyone want that on there?
title: It's nice but

author: Dominic Barrios
comment: I love how it looks on my G Watch R.  Probably one of the best watch face I've seen so far.  Though I love the blue color, it'd be nice if there's also an option to change the color inside?
title: Looks great on my G Watch R

author: Dario Moscoso
comment: The screen is hard to see in daylight. There are no adjustments for additional light. Also, it takes too long to respond from ambient setting.
title: Watch face faded

author: David Chiu
comment: Would be fantastic if the name was taken off.

author: Malcolm galletly
comment: Oooooooooo yes.  Only one I'd  buy... more to come with comments

author: Eduardo Olaya
comment: Very nice

author: Robin Riley Sloan
comment: Awesome & Classy

author: Shea Hutchison
comment: This watch has many customizations and is very clean looking. It wasn't my taste, but it has a lot to offer for the price from color customization of the background and second to how it displays in ambient mode. You can even remove the Mirage logo if you choose. I would recommend it for anyone who wants a clean face.
title: Very Clean

author: Bamdad Samimy
comment: I installed 2 times but stops working when i uses this watch face on moto360
title: Not working on moto 360

author: Alexandru Coman
comment: Nice simple watchface. But why doeso the app need to run continuously on the phone, even with another face on or Wear disabled?
title: Nice
